bio: Results-driven Lead Full Stack Developer with proven expertise in team leadership, ETL architecture, and distributed computing solutions.

Demonstrated success in managing development teams, implementing scalable solutions, and driving technical innovation. Strong background in Angular, Django, C# .NET, and PySpark with a focus on cloud-native architectures and DevOps practices.
Track record of delivering high-impact projects while mentoring team members and fostering a culture of technical excellence.
